org.miktim.websocket

Class WsConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.miktim.websocket.WsConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class WsConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    WebSocket client side or server side connection.

    • Field Detail

      • MESSAGE_QUEUE_CAPACITY

        @Deprecated
public static final int MESSAGE_QUEUE_CAPACITY
        Deprecated. Use WsConnection.setMaxMessages method instead.
        Max count of pending messages per connection.

        Overflow of the incoming message queue leads to an error and connection closure with status code 1008 (POLICY_VIOLATION).

        See Also:
        WsStatus, Constant Field Values
